title: Dihydroartemisinin modulated arachidonic acid metabolism and mitigated liver inflammation by inhibiting the activation of 5-LOX and COX-2
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Yu Xue, Junlan Lu, Yiwei Liu, Yuting Gao, Yi Gong, Yanguang Yang, Yajun Xiong, Xinli Shi
